nodes.text: Lina was a female who was the Queen of the planet Onderon during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. The protocol droid C2-D4 served Queen Lina's court as a translator, though he later left the court's service and became the partner of the Wookiee smuggler Jakarro. She was also the mother of King Regalun Petryph.
